PHRASE.LANG: Brice le bonhomme en Pain d'Épice
Even if you can't give them a sweet kiss, you can give them this. [#Legal]
Si vous ne pouvez pas lui offrir un tendre baiser, offrez-lui ceci. [#Legal]
Auch wenn du sie nicht küssen kannst, so kannst du ihnen das hier schenken. [#Legal]
Magari non potrai regalare un bacio ma puoi sempre donare queste tortine. [#Legal]
A falta de besos, buenas son tortas. [#Legal]
당신이 그들에게 달콤한 키스는 주지 못할지라도, 이것은 줄 수 있을 꺼에요. [#Legal]
Even if you can't give them a sweet kiss, you can give them this. [#Legal]
就算不能獻上香吻，也能用這些表示心意。 [#Legal]
就算不能獻上香吻，也能用這些表示心意。 [#Legal]
Even if you can't give them a sweet kiss, you can give them this. [#Legal]
